text.tspan: Handles Data in two different states :
pending data, poped from the stack
to be written in the blockchain, and
official data, found in blocks contained
in the blockchain of this node.
Build entities json objects from json documents objects.
Pop data from the pool to
Compute a block with a given proof of work by trying nonces
Stacks of promises to be handled. High level classes
getting the state of the blockchain
requests and building of merkles trees..
Provides CLI interfaces and tracking of blocks generation.
Input streams : Ensures data is correctly formatted
Output streams : Ensures data is correctly format
Handle BMA HTTP requests and answers.
Submit data to the Server Duplex interface.
